elements.2211.03023_7fee6291ec205afd0c613739cdfcb: Maintenance is a crucial problem in industrial production
elements.2211.03023_f1a74f941ca0b32d5fb99d302da02: Time-based maintenance (TBM) and condition-based maintenance (CBM) are two categories into which maintenance solutions can be separated based on different standards
elements.2211.03023_5387a5f5bede962c6baaea28be6cc: Because CBM is more adaptable than TBM and the outcome of condition-based judgment is more accurate than that of time-based judgment, CBM has recently attracted increased attention
elements.2211.03023_573fce74c7552199d090b01a6ab17: Corrective maintenance (CM), also known as replacement or perfect maintenance, is usually carried out when a unit fails
elements.2211.03023_afd60a3f27c12d606db517aeba579: The unit that has performed corrective maintenance will be the same as the new one
elements.2211.03023_58db43e3c8ad196b802bd5f16f36e: However, when it comes to industrial manufacturing, the failure of some components will result in significant losses
elements.2211.03023_1359e0400eb1bb3cbfa66d9866a54: Preventive maintenance (PM) is essential to avoiding such system failure, and the preventative maintenance of CBM is currently a popular topic in academic research
elements.2211.03023_84df70fd4c52454b5271c260a2492: An overview of the optimal maintenance models of condition-based random deterioration systems can be found in
elements.2211.03023_9def147e81730e779e3e5fe285328: In most CBM models, preventive maintenance is always assumed to be perfect, since this kind of model is much easier to analyze
elements.2211.03023_8d6f7fac8c8555dc7ab3d6f17a4cd: However, in reality, preventive maintenance is imperfect for a number of reasons, such as the lack of expertise of the maintenance staff, unstable maintenance supplies, and unforeseen events throughout the maintenance process
elements.2211.03023_8cf3052d81a8999d8c8eea574135a: Therefore, we need to introduce the concept of imperfect maintenance
elements.2211.03023_4bded61a4930168d530a516bf8364: Imperfect maintenance (IM) restores the health condition of a degrading system to any degradation level between as-good-as-new and as-bad-as-old
elements.2211.03023_ee4f33aa977b14af66e022f3ed435: Generally speaking, The cost of imperfect maintenance will typically be less expensive than the cost of corrective maintenance, however imperfect maintenance will result in more maintenance tasks
elements.2211.03023_025e62bb25479280f05309ced4f38: Therefore, decision-makers need to make a trade-off between corrective maintenance and imperfect maintenance actions to minimize the total cost of the system
elements.2211.03023_75c28fca75e666f0cf47b0a3a7d3f: The models describing imperfect maintenance are mainly divided into three categories
elements.2211.03023_e840ab22e2d53cff918763568b73f: The first type is the minimum preventive maintenance model, in which the system returns to the state it was in prior to the most recent level of degradation after an imperfect maintenance, see
elements.2211.03023_bb58c842b5a49091736e14a3f59eb: The second type is random improvement model, where the reduction of the system's post-maintenance deterioration state is a random variable, see
elements.2211.03023_57d1c49458ac69ef6df6d2cb35ccd: The third type is the improvement factor model, in which an improvement factor is multiplied to the system's degradation state after an imperfect maintenance, see
elements.2211.03023_39974fd7e80207f874ffcf9105f06: The improvement factor model was originally introduced by M.A.K. Malik
elements.2211.03023_fd4a9a1e6a9c21a2fea6efc95b411: Since then, numerous scholars have modified it, taking into account things like system longevity, maintenance frequency, inspection time, and other variables
elements.2211.03023_e7e379863b03083a8d5e99627c690: For a review on improvement factor model, see

elements.2211.03023_4678f0bb3ae92436829f17a0831b0: We apply the preceding results to a component coating maintenance model as an illustration
elements.2211.03023_9f3ffd4b73830cbbc06d87963b199: Multi-layer protective coatings are applied to the surface of materials to resist corrosion of those affected by the environment
elements.2211.03023_4a13199bcc57a05bcba6e16a5dafa: Due to natural evaporation or wear, the protective coating's thickness will gradually diminish over time
elements.2211.03023_820ff8de7d66d29249dd4c0ab79a6: Accidents such as collisions and chemical liquid corrosions, may potentially result in a decrease in coating thickness or even direct peeling
elements.2211.03023_a633c8c7adf6151fc8ad969295017: The substance is immediately exposed to the air when the covering has entirely worn off
elements.2211.03023_24a45fee7a00f1de7433f8b9f4365: Sometimes this exposure might lead to structural failures of components, which have serious safety consequences
elements.2211.03023_2c15d326182e5f41d2078bc26b6e6: Preventive maintenance is necessary to avoid material failures, such as patching anti-corrosion paint, replacing parts, etc
elements.2211.03023_84bf788767a9c0df3de427d18ae1d: In this model, repairing protective paint can be regarded as imperfect maintenance, replacing new parts can be considered as corrective maintenance
elements.2211.03023_20a47e1c7654a98522eea6da803ae: For researches on corrosion modeling and maintenance, interested readers could refer to
elements.2211.03023_a2067f000a66a5a21f341e2512104: We assume that the time unit of simulation is day, and the total simulation time is one year, which means
elements.2211.03023_22b609824c01bf596b84872909565: Assume that the thickness of the coating is 5 mm
elements.2211.03023_2ecfd8c9bc1fef6769dcca821ee10: The relationship between natural loss of thickness and days can be determined by ODEs based on different materials and environments, see
elements.2211.03023_5d03c1ab111abee486f626a1c2553: It can also be modeled by statistic methods, such as regression analysis based on past data, see

elements.2211.03023_b0eecdb38b5519bb1e660781b703a: Our approach has the following advantages over TMM
elements.2211.03023_d211bfb8c6be2209a52d51ff3bc27: First, our method can handle scenarios where it is challenging to express strategies using threshold models, such as circumstances where there are numerous different types of thresholds

elements.2211.03023_043a9eb965da0ffa625db63cdd286: The calculation of average discounted cost cannot avoid errors by exhausting all threshold combinations; hence, large-scale calculations are necessary to attain improved accuracy
elements.2211.03023_d994217dc37e5a308cc39bd225d6b: As long as the iteration matrix converges by setting the stopping limit
elements.2211.03023_d5e77051dcfe106f7b9aba5110ec9: , our model can achieve the approximate optimal strategy
elements.2211.03023_a56e8550ea22dca495f046d96d217: Third, the optimal strategy obtained by our model is deterministic while the optimal threshold combination obtained by exhausting all possible thresholds is unstable.

elements.2211.03023_98d89d4e39cf64cc064b7a6bf8f01: As the discount factor rises, the current value of the future cost falls; on the other hand, as the discount factor falls, the current value of the future cost rises closer to the value of the true future cost

elements.2211.03023_97219f1285e5fa23abd5331d0d1d3: Sensitivity analysis on inspection time interval
elements.2211.03023_3347200a9ce85043e4cb7d9aee3e0: An essential factor taken into account in the majority of maintenance models is the ideal observation interval
elements.2211.03023_0a266c084da43c030ad2b36bed45e: The deterioration status of the system should not change much when the inspection time interval is too short
elements.2211.03023_122099b26ea02ff959709091d8f60: This would result in a lot of pointless inspections and raise the cost
elements.2211.03023_0d2cfee032a36b43a1f54c86e473f: The system is in a high state of deterioration when the inspection interval is too long, which raises operating costs and increases the likelihood of system failure
elements.2211.03023_493b0c2972a41cb0427a018b71d35: The foregoing analysis clearly shows that as the observation interval is increased, the system's overall cost first reduces before increasing
elements.2211.03023_cf7bcc97b34ff8a059d2163975af9: This implies that the cost is a convex function with regard to the observation interval
elements.2211.03023_ac96535a0c637cfeb1340d5dbcb16: Therefore, an optimal interval could be chosen in order to keep the system's cost to a minimum
elements.2211.03023_458c44f693b4bbb15d99612f3cd5d: increases, fewer iterations are necessary for a convergence to occur
